title: General Medical Consent Form
description: Standard consent for medical treatment and care

fields.label: Patient Acknowledgment and Consent
fields.description: Please read carefully and initial each section

fields.label: I consent to medical treatment
fields.description: I voluntarily consent to such medical and healthcare services as may be deemed necessary or advisable

validation.required: You must consent to receive treatment

fields.label: I have received the Notice of Privacy Practices
fields.description: I acknowledge that I have been offered a copy of the practice's Notice of Privacy Practices

fields.label: I understand my financial responsibility
fields.description: I understand that I am financially responsible for all charges whether or not they are covered by insurance

fields.label: Assignment of insurance benefits
fields.description: I assign and authorize direct payment to the provider of any insurance benefits otherwise payable to me

fields.label: Photo ID verification
fields.description: I understand I may be asked to show photo identification for verification purposes

fields.label: Telehealth services consent (optional)
fields.description: I consent to receive healthcare services via telehealth/telemedicine when appropriate

fields.label: Legal Representative Name
fields.description: If signing on behalf of a minor or as legal guardian

fields.label: Patient Signature
fields.description: By signing below, I acknowledge that I have read and agree to the above statements
